question: Will it not be Shirk or Haraam if I cast vote in favour of a political leader who does shirk by asking blessings from the "Mazaar" ?
answer:
QUESTION

Will it not be Shirk or Haraam if I cast vote in favour of a political leader who does shirk by asking blessings from the "Mazaar" ?

It has been observed that many political leaders starts their political campaign from the "Mazaar Shareef" and asking blessing from the "Pir Shaheb". So far I know such act of these political leaders is Shirk. My question is, will it be Shirk or Haraam if I cast vote in favour of him in the election

ANSWER


Share:

Although the political leader in question is guilty of Shirk, it will still be permissible to vote for him.

You are not voting in his favour because of his religious affiliation. You are voting for him because you regard him to be the most suitable to carry out the work entrusted to him.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.
